channel.title: I need help please its fast please!
channel.description: this is what happened...yesterday me and my friends were playing on my server and everything was alright..but today i logged in and none of my friends could log in it kept saying connection lost... I tried using every source i have and it still tells them error connecting to server.... Any idea on ow to fix this problem any help is appreciated tysm!!!!!!

item.title: I need help please its fast please!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

If “you” can’t log on with the ip it gives you at www.whatismyip.com then nobody can get on. You have a port forward problem. To your problem where you said it worked the day before, if you lost connection at all or restarted your computer, it might have changed your computer’s ip, thus you needing to port forward again. I had that problem and it’s only happened twice to me in 4 months.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help please its fast please!
